Bottle Cap Wind Chimes: Challenge yourself to create a set of wind chimes using bottle caps as the primary material. You can use different shapes and sizes of bottle caps to create a melodious sound.

Bottle Cap Mosaic Art: Embrace the challenge of creating a mosaic art piece using bottle caps as the primary material. You can create a vibrant and colorful mosaic using different shapes and colors of bottle caps.
